  • Constructor Details

    • BS_Guest_ViewModel

      public BS_Guest_ViewModel()
      The BS_Guest_ViewModel function is the constructor for the BS_Guest_ViewModel class. It initializes a new BookScrabbleGuestFacade object and adds itself as an observer to it. It also calls two other functions, 1. initializeProperties() initializes all the properties of the class. 2. initializeUpdateMap() initializes the updatesMap, which is a map of all the updates from the guest.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(Observable o, Object arg)
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard()
      The setBoard function is used to update the viewableBoard with the current state of the board. This function is called by HostFacade whenever a change has been made to the board, and it notifies all observers that there has been a change.
      Specified by:
      setBoard in interface BS_ViewModel

    • setHand

      public void setHand()
      The setHand function is used to update the viewable hand of the guest player.
      Specified by:
      setHand in interface BS_ViewModel

    • setScore

      public void setScore()
      The setScore function is used to update the score of each player in the game. It does this by iterating through a list of players and updating their scores accordingly. It then notifies all observers that there has been a change in order to update the GUI.
      Specified by:
      setScore in interface BS_ViewModel

    • tryPlaceWord

      public void tryPlaceWord(String word, int row, int col, boolean isVertical)
      The tryPlaceWord function is used to place a word on the board. It does this by taking in the word, row, column, and orientation from the GUI and passing them to the HostFacade.
      Specified by:
      tryPlaceWord in interface BS_ViewModel
      Parameters:
      word - Pass the word that is being placed on the board
      row - Specify the row where the word is to be placed
      col - Determine the column of the board where the word will be placed
      isVertical - Determine if the word is placed vertically or horizontally

    • passTurn

      public void passTurn()
      The passTurn function is called when the player clicks on the "Pass" button. It calls a function in the hostFacade that will pass turn to another player.
      Specified by:
      passTurn in interface BS_ViewModel

    • challengeRequest

      public void challengeRequest(String challengeWord)
      The challengeRequest function is called when the user clicks on the challenge button. It sends a request to the server to activate a challenge, and then clears all of the viewable words for challenge.
      Specified by:
      challengeRequest in interface BS_ViewModel
      Parameters:
      challengeWord - Pass the challenge word to the server

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      The endGame function is called when the game has ended, after winner was displayed. It calls a function in GuestFacade that will end the game (the "End Game" button will be enabled only when all clients are disconnected).
      Specified by:
      endGame in interface BS_ViewModel

    • setPlayerProperties

      public void setPlayerProperties(String name)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      name - Set the player's name

      setWordsForChallenge in interface BS_ViewModel

    • initializeProperties

      public void initializeProperties()
      The initializeProperties function initializes the properties of the guest player. It sets up all the viewable tiles for both the board and hand, as well as setting up a list to hold scores. The function also initializes a string property that will be used to display the score of all the players, Finally, it creates an arraylist that will hold words for challenges.
      Specified by:
      initializeProperties in interface BS_ViewModel

    • initializeUpdateMap

      public void initializeUpdateMap()
      The initializeUpdateMap function is a function that initializes the viewCommandsFromClient map. The viewCommandsFromClient map is a HashMap that maps String keys to Consumer<String> values. The initializeUpdateMap function adds key-value pairs to the viewCommandsFromClient map, where each key-value pair represents an action and its corresponding method call.
      Specified by:
      initializeUpdateMap in interface BS_ViewModel
